results.title: Fight Club
results.overview: A ticking-time-bomb insomniac and a slippery soap salesman channel primal male aggression into a shocking new form of therapy.

results.title: The Dark Knight
results.overview: Batman raises the stakes in his war on crime with the help of Lt. Jim Gordon and District Attorney Harvey Dent.

results.title: The Godfather
results.overview: Spanning the years 1945 to 1955, a chronicle of the fictional Italian-American Corleone crime family.

results.title: Schindler's List
results.overview: The true story of how businessman Oskar Schindler saved over a thousand Jewish lives during the Holocaust.

results.title: Pulp Fiction
results.overview: A burger-loving hit man, his philosophical partner, a drug-addled gangster's moll and a washed-up boxer converge.
